text: Sphingomonas mucosissima is a Gram-negative and non-motile bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from soil crusts from the Colorado Plateau in the United States.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen UniProt == Further reading == * * * * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas mucosissima at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase mucosissima Category:Bacteria described in 2007
title: Sphingomonas mucosissima
